data.title: Add a lint pass to verify traitinfo palette references.
Unhardcode sound and delay in PlaceBuilding.
data.body:
https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/pull/8688/files?w=1

Also stores `order.OrderString` in a variable.

data.title: Adding Weather-Overlay for rain and snow
data.body:
Hey,
after 3 days getting into the code, finally some progress. Here's the first screenshot.
![screenshot 2015-07-08 18 17 00](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/5147014/8582733/f6d04f96-25c8-11e5-8645-c5ccfee241c4.png)

data.title: Added debris to Tiberian Sun
data.body: This is a bit placeholder quality to be honest. Just set this up so we don't forget it exists. Can certainly be improved later on.

data.title: Added projectile sprite testing to the CheckYaml lint rules
data.body: A followup of https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/pull/7709 for projectile sprites. This can detect crashes like #8219 and #8020 beforehand.

data.title: Exposed GlobalPaletteEffect to the Lua API for day/night cycles
data.body: This is inspired by how you can set up lighting triggers to create such effects in Tiberian Sun.

data.title: Fixed hard-coded and hard to read colors in ServerBrowser
data.body: Made the server browser text color per-mod configurable and fixed https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/issues/7901.

data.title: Fixed a crash when activating a nuke during sudden powerdown
data.body: Fixes https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/issues/8141.

data.title: Fixed GDI upgrade center being visible in Nod build palette
data.body: Fixes https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/issues/8522.

data.title: Some text field improvements.
data.body: This is split from #8118.

data.title: Added configurable MinimumExcessPower to HackyAI
data.body:
Reduces the problem that AI constantly builds itself out of power.

Partially adresses #8565.

data.title: Fix thread safety issues in FieldLoader
data.body:
FieldLoader may be used concurrently by a bunch of threads (map load, etc), but the error handling is mutable global state which the caller is expected to set up and restore around the load operation.

Ref #8669
## <bountysource-plugin>

Want to back this issue? **[Post a bounty on it!](https://www.bountysource.com/issues/23891012-fix-thread-safety-issues-in-fieldloader?utm_campaign=plugin&utm_content=tracker%2F36085&utm_medium=issues&utm_source=github)** We accept bounties via [Bountysource](https://www.bountysource.com/?utm_campaign=plugin&utm_content=tracker%2F36085&utm_medium=issues&utm_source=github).
</bountysource-plugin>

data.title: Disguised spies are not defined as spies
data.body:
At least for spectators.
This guy is not a Magic Hat rocket soldier but is an Alapepitua spy.
![spyfaction](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/8930382/8554522/92a105b2-24ea-11e5-9615-f5571b954902.png)

data.title: Enabled UI localisation for the Red Alert mod
data.body: To get started on this. Using the automation from https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/pull/5152. Also reverts https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/commit/a99d7fee8233baea649936ee425f9313dfe80e94.

data.title: Removed InitialActivity from FreeActor and Buildable
data.body: For `Harvester`s, `FindResources` is now queued from `Created()`, provided `SearchOnCreation` is set to `true`.

data.title: Benchmarking
data.body:
We already measure CPU and rendering performance and display it in-game when activated under _Settings_ - _Advanced_. It is also possible to run replays via double-click or the command line as well as start semi-deterministic games using Lua scripts as seen in our shellmaps.

For @phoronix-test-suite integration we need some kind of machine readable output format for those. Either dump it to the console, into a log text file or raw values into CSV. I don't know what is preferable here.

data.title: Convert remaining terrain layers to use TerrainSpriteLayer
data.body: Extends #8649 to the remaining types.

data.title: Music player stops after first song
data.body: RA mod, no shuffle, no loop selected. When game launches, music starts to play automatically. But it stops after the first song. I have the full scores.mix installed.

data.title: Chronoshift did not chrono all units back
data.body:
Just encountered an interesting bug, when I chronod my tanks "german"-style into the enemy base the game surprisingly chronod all units back except one at the end of the chrono action.

![Permanent Chrono](http://i.imgur.com/MklvNAu.gif)

Replay:
https://www.dropbox.com/s/3qfqkdbp9ck3toi/OpenRA-2015-07-06T183755Z_chrono.orarep?dl=0
(Around 17:30)
## <bountysource-plugin>

Want to back this issue? **[Post a bounty on it!](https://www.bountysource.com/issues/23812593-chronoshift-did-not-chrono-all-units-back?utm_campaign=plugin&utm_content=tracker%2F36085&utm_medium=issues&utm_source=github)** We accept bounties via [Bountysource](https://www.bountysource.com/?utm_campaign=plugin&utm_content=tracker%2F36085&utm_medium=issues&utm_source=github).
</bountysource-plugin>

data.title: Ensure FieldLoader is left in its original state when loading Settings
data.body: If something throws, ensure we don't leave FieldLoader in a borked state on the way out. Discovered by Coverity. [Diff ignoring whitespace.](https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/pull/8669/files?w=1)

data.title: Game has full cpu utilization in main menu when shellmap is turned off
data.body: And music is turned off too, so it's doing nothing but task manager shows full cpu utilization...

data.title: Renamed WRange to WDist
data.body: We planned to do that last year. Almost last remainder of https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/issues/5274.

data.title: Reverted friendly units' immunity to EMP.
data.body:
Also removed the explicit enemy vehicle targeting.

I acknowledge, I introduced this, but tbh, I consider these features and not bugs.

data.title: Removed unused duplicated code in Warhead.cs
data.body: This is a left-over from https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/pull/6030 which now lives in WeaponInfo.cs for quite some time.

data.title: Removed code duplication from Mobile.cs
data.body: Detected by dupFinder.

data.title: Fixed a crash when disguising the spy as infantry without stand2
data.body: Some recent sequence cleanups must have undone my workaround in https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/pull/4265. Time to fix it properly. http://resource.openra.net/maps/3367/ is a good test case. It has c2 in the creep base near the weapon factory.

data.title: Upgradable TargetableUnit & apply to Allies 03
Rename the Country trait to Faction
data.body:
This is another split off from #7873.
It's not as scary as it looks at first glance - it only renames 3 things.

P.S.: A long time ago, when this was planned, it was proposed that Race be renamed to ID. I am open to suggestions on that point, in case anyone doesn't like InternalName too much. I can go with ID (or something else) if requested.

data.title: Fix a bug in Server
data.body: I derped in #8629...
